snippet.title: SnowRunner - Season 8 | Grand Harvest Expansion Overview Trailer
snippet.description:
Play now: https://store.focus-entmt.com/w/snowrunnergames?utm_campaign=SR_S8_Release&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTube
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Focus_entmt
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FocusEntertainmentOfficial

SnowRunner’s second expansion Grand Harvest is out now. Watch the Overview Trailer and start farming today!

SnowRunner, the blockbuster off-roading experience from Saber Interactive and Focus Entertainment, today welcomes its second expansion, Season 8: Grand Harvest. Available to all Year 2 Pass owners on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and PC, this new entry brings a new region, complete with four massive summer maps to explore, where Runners will get to try an all-new activity: farming! Watch today’s Overview Trailer for all the details on this new expansion.

Bet the farm on this all-new season of SnowRunner

SnowRunner brings you the joys of farming for the first time in Season 8: Grand Harvest! Deep in the countryside, operate three new vehicles to restore sustainable farming activities after a streak of crop failures and poor harvests. Work the land with the incredible horsepower of the heavy-duty 4WD tractor Kirovets K700 and its modern K7M version, and transport fertilizers and produce with the vintage heavy-duty Step 39331 “Pike”. Explore a vast new region, with four 4km² maps of countryside for you to rehabilitate by renovating the local town and its airfield, building a clean energy infrastructure, fixing farming equipment and more!

The Year 3 Pass is coming soon

It’s nearly time for the Year 3 Pass to expand the SnowRunner experience even further, with four new phases of content to be released, as well as new vehicles, new maps, add-ons and more! It will also grant instant access to the exclusive Save the Day Vinyl Wrap Pack, which adds four exclusive skins for the Freightliner M916, Freightliner 114SD, International HX520 and the Chevrolet Kodiak С70 (1981)! More info soon!

Conquer any terrain with the super-powered Rezvani Hercules    
                                                                    
SnowRunner is also welcoming an impressive new addition to its survival truck roster: the Rezvani Hercules, a high-performance 6-wheel Scout truck with a fierce and unique modern look. The first Rezvani vehicle to join the game’s roster, the Hercules is a sleek powerhouse with incredible off-road capabilities, thanks to its long wheelbase and wide frame that provides additional stability. Whether it’s transporting a ton of spare parts and fuel, or going ever deeper in the wilderness, there is simply no match for the Hercules’ versatility. Not included in the Year 2 Pass.

SnowRunner, its Premium Edition, and its Year 1 and Year 2 Passes are available now on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and PC. Season 8: Grand Harvest is available now on all platforms. Rezvani Hercules is available on all platforms as a standalone DLC. For more information, check out the game’s page on the Focus Store.
